title: Set all positions to 2 open slots

requirements.text: Update the backend capacity enforcement so that each basketball position (Forward, Center, Guard) has a maximum of 2 slots instead of the current cap of 5.

quotes: Make it so all positions have two slots open.

acceptanceCriteria: The backend rejects sign-ups for any position once 2 players have already registered for that position.
Sign-ups for a position with fewer than 2 registered players are accepted normally.
All three positions (Forward, Center, Guard) share the same cap of 2.

requirements.text: Update the HeroSection stats bar to display '2 slots' (instead of '5 slots') for each position (Forward, Center, Guard).

quotes: Make it so all positions have two slots open.

acceptanceCriteria: The stats bar in HeroSection shows '2 slots' for Forward, Center, and Guard.
The displayed slot count reflects the updated capacity of 2.
